content.html: hey so everyone knows, I am going to stay friends with my ex spouse bc he is a good dude. please please please do not feel the need to take a "side." if you were friends with him before, you still are! to ~quote @brianwisti, there are no sides but if there is one, I'm on his.
content.value: hey so everyone knows, I am going to stay friends with my ex spouse bc he is a good dude.  please please please do not feel the need to take a "side."  if you were friends with him before, you still are!  to ~quote @brianwisti, there are no sides but if there is one, I'm on his.
